value:
The Order of Heroes isn't doing all
of this to gain rewards or gather
accolades.$k$pIt's purely in the interest of saving
people. I find that marvelous.

Our mercenary group has an
unusual reputation. We're known to
do jobs without payment.$k$pAnd we sometimes take a job only
to help save people. But we never
do it solely for the money.

Anything I can assist you with? I'm
glad to handle any task, for all jobs
are crucial among mercenaries.$k$pWhy, I've even been known to help
Mist with laundry on occasion. No
dirtier task than that in our group.

Training must become instinct for
those who want to survive on the
battlefield.$k$pAnd so, we must master our
abilities, our very bodies, until
our training is in our blood.

I wish our mercenary group's old
commander, Greil, could see how
well his son has developed.$k$pHe has carried on Greil's legacy
very nicely as our leader.

Hello. I've come to bring you
greetings from your friend
$Nf.

Delightful! This reminds me of my
earliest days in battle.

I use the experience of each and
every battle to fuel my fire.

It's sometimes clear that I'm not
as spry as I once was.

Thank you for placing such trust in
me. I will strive to do my best.

I am Titania, deputy commander of
the Greil Mercenaries. Do you have
a job for me? If so, let's start now.

Today I'd like to show you what
it's like to wield an axe,
$Nu.$k$pFirst lesson! Make sure you swing
the axe so the axe doesn't swing
you.$k$pNow, give my axe a try. Good,
but set your hips so it makes a
base that will not sway.$k$pOh? Ready to stop so soon?
Working such training into your
bones and blood could save you.$k$pBut I suppose that's my job, and
I'm glad that you've summoned
me into this world to do it.$k$pIt's long been my desire to fight
with pride, saving people, with no
regard for money or honor.$k$pHow lucky I am to have found a
friend in you.$k$pSo, if you wish it, I'll protect your
life, as one of your truest friends,
for as long as you'll have me.
はぁっ！
せいっ！
きゃああっ！
N-not yet!
I will triumph!
In service to the cause!
We will survive!
Don't make me angry!
Go on...
Heehee
I am with the Greil Mercenaries. Have you a job for us?
Wha—? Phew! That was close. Not a good idea to sneak up on me.
So you're the Great Hero I'm hearing about? A legend already at your age!
I'd like to ask you—how many years do you think I've been doing this?
Some think daily training is boring. I think it keeps you alive. So let's keep it up, all right?
What to do...? A battle of strength? You do realize who you're talking to, right?
Whatever the path you choose, I will be there right beside you.
Yes.
Stay alert.
Live on.
